The last will and testament of Mr. Iohn Kendricke late citizen and draper of London vvho departed this life the 30. day of December, anno, 1624. Full of notable workes of charity, worthy of lasting memory and imitation. Kendricke, John, 1574 or 5-1624.
[2], 31, [1] p.
Printed [by M. Flesher] for Nathaniel Butter and Nicholas Bourne, London : 1625.
Printer's name from STC. "Pagination in sheets D and E in top outer corner of page"--STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[2], 31, [1] p.
Printed [by M. Flesher] for Nathaniel Butter and Nicholas Bourne, London : 1625.
